# Core dependencies for ragpackai
langchain
langchain-openai
openai
chromadb
pydantic
sentence-transformers
faiss-cpu
tqdm
PyPDF2
cryptography
ipykernel
dotenv
langchain-chroma
# Optional dependencies (install as extras)
# Google: google-cloud-aiplatform, langchain-google-vertexai
# Groq: groq, langchain-groq  
# Cerebras: cerebras-cloud-sdk, langchain-cerebras
# NVIDIA: langchain-nvidia-ai-endpoints

# Development dependencies
pytest>=7.0.0
pytest-cov>=4.0.0
black>=22.0.0
flake8>=5.0.0
mypy>=1.0.0
